note: # input file
# scale of the data to be plotted as stacks
# main variable, shown on Y axis
# X label
# Y label
# column containing categories of data to be plotted as subplots
# type of plot: bar, barh
# comma-separated list of rows to keep or remove rows. Format: '~column_name:value'. Remove '~' to keep only that data category.
# columns to be ignored in the line plot
# variable to be represented in the colour scheme
# colour pallete, if colour file not provided
# Legend position (e.g. best , upper left, etc). If left empty, no legend will be displayed)
# Label position (e.g. best , upper left, etc. If left empty, no legend will be displayed)
# number of columns of the legend
# frequency of tick in X axis
# order of ticks in non-numerical axis
# show grip for X or Y axis?
# number of rows of the multiplot
# number of columns of the multiplot
# same Y axis scale
# same Y axis scale
# minimum value for Y axis
# maximum value for Y axis
# convert values to white scale
# figure size: width and height, in inches
